ai-tha-ap267:1.4_0: were fully developed, said in the sāl tree grove.
ai-tha-ap267:2.3_0: He has compassion for all beings,
ai-tha-ap267:3.1_0: My hair was as black as bees,
ai-tha-ap267:3.3_0: When continued existence has become extinguished,
ai-tha-ap267:4.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
ai-tha-ap267:4.4_0: This is the fruit of reed.
ai-tha-ap267:5.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
ai-tha-ap267:6.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Bāḷavāḷāgodhā.
ai-tha-ap267:7.1_0: He was the fifth poor in Bamboo Grove.
